# ðŸ“Š Excel Financial Sales Analysis

## ðŸ“Œ Project Overview
This project analyzes financial sales data using Microsoft Excel to uncover revenue trends, profitability gaps, and performance insights.

The analysis focuses on:
- Sales trends over time
- Profit vs Loss analysis
- Category-wise performance
- Business insights using Pivot Tables and Charts

---

## ðŸ›  Tools Used
- Microsoft Excel
- Pivot Tables
- Pivot Charts
- Conditional Formatting
- Financial KPIs

---

## ðŸ“ˆ Key Analysis Performed
- Monthly sales aggregation
- Profitability analysis
- Loss identification
- Pivot-based summaries
- Visual storytelling using charts
